content: 10x 2dc between next double_crochet pair *2x single_crochet in next 3ch space 5x 2dc between next double_crochet pair * turn 12 *bpdc chain* bpdc turn handy hint before doing the first bpdc i did a single chain repeat row 9 to 12 finish on a row you like the look of © kirsten bishop 2018 | 5 6 | meranda © kirsten bishop 2018 | 7
